song_name: In the Valley of Victory and Defeat
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, In the Valley of Victory and Defeat is significantly more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: In the Valley of Victory and Defeat has sections analyzed in the following keys: F Minor, F♯ Minor,  and G♯ Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
